setting-up_key1: Download the project files using the github repository -
setting-up_key6: Ab aap iss project ko thoda debugger use kar kar samjhein, ki yeh project kaise kaam kar raha hai. Hum iss project mei kaafi saarein chote chote features implement karenge. `Terminal` par run kar kar bhi program ko samjhein.
setting-up_key8: Observe karein ki `code` kaisa likha hua hai, aur woh baat `code` karte hue dhyaan rakhein.
setting-up_key9: Jaise `variables` aur functions ka naam snake_case mei hai
setting-up_key11: Constants ka naam CAPS_CASE mei hai
setting-up_key12: Functions ki documentation ki gayi hai - ki kya argument hai, aur kya return karta hai. Iss documentiation se `python` aapke liye hints bhi generate karta hai. Documentation ''' ''' tags ke andar hai.
setting-up_key13: Aapko bhi yeh sab cheezein follow karni hai - iss `code` mei, aur otherwise bhi. Isse aapka `code` readable hota hai, aur aap usse acche se maintain aur develop kar paoge.
